The spark glowed at flashed in front of BrightBlade.

OCC: Gonna respond? If ya don't I can't get rolling...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 13, 2000 4:42 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars




* BrightBlade smiled back at Perndabot as he lowers the massive weapon, the
little stress that remained between the two now gone and she relaxes a bit
more.  She had thought that he was going to be a little irate, a Predacon
commenting an Alliance bot and all. Most would just say that it wasn't
right.
As he responded to the end of her last comment she just couldn't help but
think just what other things he would be.best at. Shaking her head at her
own thoughts.
BrightBlade noticed the way that Perndabot looked her over, his eyes playing
over the curves of her body. She couldn't help but be a bit proud that she
was worth looking at in that way, never thinking before that she was even a
bit pretty except for Gangon's comments.
Just then she wondered where he was again, though the thought passing
quickly as she heard Perndabot speak again.
She was just about to reply when Reptilica suddenly spoke towards Perndabot,
then she simply watched as a small scene spread out in front of her.
BrightBlade smiles as she then sees all three other of the Alliance bots
backing away from Perndabot and his tone, actually fairly impressed by the
bots show of power. She always did like a man who put his power to good use,
intimidating others was just part of the things that she liked.
With her optics still on the retreating three she then heard Perndabot's
attention return to her, his tone now in it's calmer state.
She was still recovering a bit from the sheer show of power, Perndabot
seeming even more handsome to her now, even a bit.desirable. But that also
what happened.when a male showed off in front of a woman sometimes.
BrightBlade then simply recovered from the experience and then looked back
to Perndabot, a smile towards him playing on her lips again. With out
putting much thought into it she then moved, EVERY curve on her body now
able to be viewed if one was now to look. If Perndabot could show off what
he had.then so could she.
She nodded and then continued with her answer, Reptilica interrupting her
first attempt to do so. *

" Correct. I was just simply passing through on my way towards the new
Maximal battle ship, the Cybertronien Fire. I have.work to be done there.
But nothing against the Alliance, besides the fact that they get all the
handsome bots and we get all the retards!"

* Personally that was what she thought, none of the Predacon males even
seeming a bit handsome to her.or even a bit worth looking at. Besides a few,
some in which she preferred not to talk about.
But there was a fair number of well looking males in the Alliance, some in
which she had noticed in her last battle with them. Though she couldn't help
but notice, it was just her. *
